component.name: Tibetan Machine Uni
component.summary: Tibetan Machine Uni font for Tibetan, Dzongkha and Ladakhi

description.p: Tibetan Machine Uni is an TrueType OpenType, Unicode font released by THDL project. The font supports Tibetan, Dzongkha and Ladakhi in dbu-can script with full support for the Sanskrit combinations found in chos skad text.
